# Experiment bandpasses for the multi-component likelihood described in Section III of A Joint Analysis of BICEP2/Keck Array and Planck Data.

# This file provides the frequency spectrum for: P030.
#   Column 1 = frequency in GHz
#   Column 2 = response to a source with uniform spectral radiance
# See Planck 2013 results IX and BK-II for further details.
